name: Alien Cat 6
description:
If you want to feel like an attentive owner of a restless cat, then this game will be to your taste, because everyone knows that
cats walk wherever they want, and you have to make this walk a blastless with couple of clicks of your mouse.

Alien cat 6 is an indirect control platform game with a side view.
The player's task is to guide the charismatic cat along a safe path
avoiding set traps. Destroy anti-personnel mines, remove bayonets, push bridges apart using levers
so that your manual cat doesn’t fall into the abyss and can collect all the coins and successfully complete its mission.

Features:


  • Pixel Graphics
  • Attractive gameplay
  • 30 levels
